document_data.title: Serpestrillvyth
document_data.author: [[Richard Baker]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Serpestrillvyth"''' is a short story by [[Richard Baker]] included in the 2004 anthology ''[[Realms of the Dragons]]''.
document_data.Summary: The [[Company of the Argent Hawk]], experienced dragonslayers all, take on a quest to rid a village of a troublesome [[green dragon]]. But all is not as it seems…
